mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EAT_INFO ( EAT_SEQ_NO, TITLE, EAT_CONTENTS, REG_DT, CHG_DT, USER_ID )VALUES ( EAT_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{eatContents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT EI.EAT_SEQ_NO as eatSeqNo, EI.TITLE as title, EI.EAT_CONTENTS as eatContents, EI.REG_DT as regDt, EI.CHG_DT as chgDt, EI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM EAT_INFO EI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON EI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID

SELECT EI.EAT_SEQ_NO as eatSeqNo, EI.TITLE as title, EI.EAT_CONTENTS as eatContents, EI.REG_DT as regDt, EI.CHG_DT as chgDt, EI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM EAT_INFO EI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON EI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE EI.EAT_SEQ_NO = #{eatSeqNo}
